title: 75 Indians Evacuated From War-Torn Syria
content: India on Tuesday evacuated 75 Indian nationals from Syria, two days after rebel forces overthrew President Bashar Assad's authoritarian government.
summary: India on Tuesday evacuated 75 Indian nationals from Syria, two days after rebel forces overthrew President Bashar Assad's authoritarian government.

title: Outgoing US President Biden Says Trump Economic Plan Will Be "Disaster"
content: Outgoing US President Joe Biden on Tuesday branded his successor Donald Trump's economic plans a "disaster" in a speech hailing his own legacy in office.
summary: Outgoing US President Joe Biden on Tuesday branded his successor Donald Trump's economic plans a "disaster" in a speech hailing his own legacy in office.

title: In Pics: Top 10 Guinness World Records Broken In 2024
content: Sadly, Kevin's life was cut short just days after receiving this accolade. He passed away during surgery after falling ill. He had taken the record over from the Great Dane Zeus. He was 3 ft 5.18 in (1.046 m) tall.
summary: Sadly, Kevin's life was cut short just days after receiving this accolade. He passed away during surgery after falling ill. He had taken the record over from the Great Dane Zeus. He was 3 ft 5.18 in (1.046 m) tall.

title: Syrian President Bashar al-Assad In Russia, Confirms Senior Moscow Official
content: A senior Russian official told US broadcaster NBC on Tuesday that deposed Syrian leader Bashar al-Assad is being hosted in Russia, in the government's first confirmation of the situation.
summary: A senior Russian official told US broadcaster NBC on Tuesday that deposed Syrian leader Bashar al-Assad is being hosted in Russia, in the government's first confirmation of the situation.

title: Scientists From India, A Telescope In Chile, And An Astronomical Discovery
content: Astronomers from India have made an intriguing discovery in a unique tri-star solar system located 489 light years from Earth. The discovery will help astrophysicists get a better understanding of planetary formations.
summary: Astronomers from India have made an intriguing discovery in a unique tri-star solar system located 489 light years from Earth. The discovery will help astrophysicists get a better understanding of planetary formations.

title: Brazilian President Lula's Long History Of Health Woes
content: Brazil's 79-year-old President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva, who is recovering from emergency surgery after suffering an intracranial hemorrhage, has a long history of health problems and mishaps.
summary: Brazil's 79-year-old President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva, who is recovering from emergency surgery after suffering an intracranial hemorrhage, has a long history of health problems and mishaps.

title: Donald Trump To Eliminate Birthright Citizenship: Its Impact On Indians
content: The United States grants citizenship to children born within its borders, regardless of the citizenship of its parents. However, that will soon change.
summary: The United States grants citizenship to children born within its borders, regardless of the citizenship of its parents. However, that will soon change.

title: "Everything Was Destroyed": 8 Dead After Building Collapses In Egypt's Cairo
content: Eight people were killed and three more injured when a six-storey residential building collapsed in central Cairo on Tuesday, Egypt's health ministry said.
summary: Eight people were killed and three more injured when a six-storey residential building collapsed in central Cairo on Tuesday, Egypt's health ministry said.

title: Japan Atomic Bomb Survivors' Group Receives Nobel, Calls for Nuclear Ban
content: Japan's atomic bomb survivors' group Nihon Hidankyo accepted its Nobel Peace Prize on Tuesday, pleading for the abolition of nuclear weapons that are resurging as a threat 80 years after the Hiroshima and Nagasaki bombings.
summary: Japan's atomic bomb survivors' group Nihon Hidankyo accepted its Nobel Peace Prize on Tuesday, pleading for the abolition of nuclear weapons that are resurging as a threat 80 years after the Hiroshima and Nagasaki bombings.

title: Bangladesh Confirms 88 Cases Of Violence Against Minorities
content: Bangladesh on Tuesday acknowledged 88 incidents of communal violence against minorities, primarily Hindus, following the ouster of then-premier Sheikh Hasina in August.
summary: Bangladesh on Tuesday acknowledged 88 incidents of communal violence against minorities, primarily Hindus, following the ouster of then-premier Sheikh Hasina in August.

title: "Consensual": Argentine Court Drops Rape Case Against French Rugby Players
content: An Argentine court on Tuesday dismissed rape charges against two French international rugby players accused of assaulting a woman after playing a match in the country, the players' lawyers said.
summary: An Argentine court on Tuesday dismissed rape charges against two French international rugby players accused of assaulting a woman after playing a match in the country, the players' lawyers said.

title: Dungeons, Torture Chambers Exposed After Assad's Fall In Syria
content: Syrians lived in terror for decades of what went on behind the concrete walls of Damascus's security compound. Now the Assad dynasty has been toppled, its dungeons and torture chambers are giving up their secrets.
summary: Syrians lived in terror for decades of what went on behind the concrete walls of Damascus's security compound. Now the Assad dynasty has been toppled, its dungeons and torture chambers are giving up their secrets.

title: MIT Student Prahlad Iyengar Suspended Over Palestine Essay, Sparks Outrage
content: According to the college, the essay had language that "could be interpreted as a call for more violent or destructive forms of protests at MIT". The MIT Dean of Student Life, David Warren Randall emailed this to the magazine's editors.
summary: According to the college, the essay had language that "could be interpreted as a call for more violent or destructive forms of protests at MIT". The MIT Dean of Student Life, David Warren Randall emailed this to the magazine's editors.

title: Video: Luigi Mangione's Valedictorian Speech Goes Viral After Arrest
content: Luigi Mangione, a 26-year-old suspect arrested in connection to the killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, was valedictorian of the Gilman School in Baltimore in 2016, a resurfaced video shows.
summary: Luigi Mangione, a 26-year-old suspect arrested in connection to the killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, was valedictorian of the Gilman School in Baltimore in 2016, a resurfaced video shows.

title: Death Of Thai Singer Sparks Warnings About "Neck-Twisting" Massage Risks
content: The deaths of a Thai singer and a Singaporean tourist following visits to massage parlours in Thailand have sparked warnings from the country's doctors about the potentially fatal risk such treatments can pose.
summary: The deaths of a Thai singer and a Singaporean tourist following visits to massage parlours in Thailand have sparked warnings from the country's doctors about the potentially fatal risk such treatments can pose.

title: Mysterious 'Disease X' Spreads In Congo, Leaves More Than 30 Dead
content: Disease X is a term coined by WHO to describe a hypothetical, unknown pathogen with epidemic or pandemic potential.
summary: Disease X is a term coined by WHO to describe a hypothetical, unknown pathogen with epidemic or pandemic potential.

title: Syria Rebels Name Mohammed Al-Bashir Head Of Transitional Government: Report
content: The Syrian rebels now in power in Damascus appointed Mohammad al-Bashir as head of a transitional government that will be in place until March 1, state media said Tuesday.
summary: The Syrian rebels now in power in Damascus appointed Mohammad al-Bashir as head of a transitional government that will be in place until March 1, state media said Tuesday.

title: Jordanian Man Returns Home After Spending 38 Years In Syrian Jails
content: A Jordanian man has returned to his home country after spending 38 years in Syrian jails, an official said on Tuesday, after the fall of president Bashar al-Assad ended an agonising wait for his family.
summary: A Jordanian man has returned to his home country after spending 38 years in Syrian jails, an official said on Tuesday, after the fall of president Bashar al-Assad ended an agonising wait for his family.

title: India May Ink Deal Worth Billions With Russia To Counter China: Report
content: As Rajnath Singh and his top delegation of defence personnel continue their Russia visit, there are talks of a mega defence agreement between Moscow and New Delhi being in advanced stages.
summary: As Rajnath Singh and his top delegation of defence personnel continue their Russia visit, there are talks of a mega defence agreement between Moscow and New Delhi being in advanced stages.

title: Covid mRNA Vaccines Contributing To Deaths, Doctors Call For Suspension
content: Dr. Aseem Malhotra, a British Indian Consultant Cardiologist, has written an open letter to the General Medical Council (GMC) of the UK, stating that the vaccines cause greater harm than benefit.
summary: Dr. Aseem Malhotra, a British Indian Consultant Cardiologist, has written an open letter to the General Medical Council (GMC) of the UK, stating that the vaccines cause greater harm than benefit.
